LanguageData.TM_EnrageHD.label: 激怒
LanguageData.TM_EnrageHD.description: 把一个人变成一个几乎不可阻挡的狂暴怪物。愤怒会强化近战；远程武器将被丢弃.
LanguageData.TM_EnrageHD.stages.0.label: I
LanguageData.TM_EnrageHD.stages.1.label: II
LanguageData.TM_EnrageHD.stages.2.label: III
LanguageData.TM_EnrageHD.stages.3.label: IV
LanguageData.TM_EnrageHD.stages.4.label: V
LanguageData.TM_HexHD.label: 邪咒
LanguageData.TM_PainHD.label: 痛苦
LanguageData.TM_PainHD.description: 因诅咒而受到极度疼痛的伤害。
LanguageData.TM_Hex_CriticalFailHD.label: 不幸
LanguageData.TM_SpiritBondHD.label: 精神契约
LanguageData.TM_SpiritBondHD.description: 代表着这个动物灵魂与萨满签订的契约。增加物理属性，增强治疗效果。
LanguageData.TM_SpiritBondHD.stages.0.label: I
LanguageData.TM_SpiritBondHD.stages.1.label: II
LanguageData.TM_SpiritBondHD.stages.2.label: III
LanguageData.TM_SpiritBondHD.stages.3.label: IV
LanguageData.TM_CrowInsightHD.label: 乌鸦洞察
LanguageData.TM_CrowInsightHD.description: 从幽灵乌鸦获得的洞察力-提高研究速度和心灵敏感性。
LanguageData.TM_CrowInsightHD.stages.0.label: I
LanguageData.TM_CrowInsightHD.stages.1.label: II
LanguageData.TM_CrowInsightHD.stages.2.label: III
LanguageData.TM_CrowInsightHD.stages.3.label: IV
LanguageData.TM_BirdflightHD.label: 飞行
